system.description: Booze made by Street Trash and other nefarious groups out there. Word to the wise: If it’s glowing bright green, you probably shouldn’t drink it. When a shot is taken, the skumdog must make a Grit Save or become @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.tqf12qu9KwS1NONv]{Drunk}. If a skumdog has the Addiction condition for Trash Water, they must consume it once a day.
